author: Claire Cartmill
title: This year’s finalists revealed for Northern Ireland’s High Street Heroes awards 2023
description: Record-breaking online poll sees more than 12,000 entries cast in this year’s competition to determine which independent retailers, stores, coffee shops, bakeries and butchers are deemed ‘best in Northern Ireland’

author: Megan Ulu-Lani Boyanton
title: Squabble over ownership of Denver’s Aviano Coffee and lost real estate deal leads to dual lawsuits
description: A legal squabble over the ownership of Denver's Aviano Coffee and a lost real estate opportunity worth millions of dollars has its founder and investors pointing fingers at each other.

author: Joe Sweeney
title: Hot cup of happiness for Coop award winners
description: A cooperative set up by a Wolverhampton business boss to source and sell Fairtrade tea and coffee in the UK’s Coop stores has won four ‘Great Taste’ national awards – taking it’s total number of accolades to 21.

author: Expert Panel®, Forbes Councils Member
title: 20 Tips For New Employees Navigating The Remote Work Environment
description: Get up from your workspace, stretch your legs, eat lunch, refill your coffee and give your eyes a break from the screen.

author: Capt. Austin May
title: ASG-KU hosts tenant unit commanding generals, August 2023 [Image 2 of 5]
description: Col. Daniel Enslen, commander, Area Support Group - Kuwait, receives a cup of Arabic coffee during a meeting with Brig. Gen. Eric Shirley, commanding general, 1st Theater Sustainment Command, at ASG-KU headquarters, Camp Arifjan, Kuwait, Aug. 3, 2023.

author: Bree Grant
title: Be Your Own Hot Barista (& Save Monies) With These Top-Rated Coffee Machines
description: Folks, if you love your morning bean juice, you’re probably spending a minimum of $5 to $6 a day on coffee. Ooft, with cozzie livs on the rise, you’re probably looking for a bunch of ways to pinch ya pennies without sacrificing your beloved brew. Many of us have turned to either buying the best […]The post Be Your Own Hot Barista (& Save Monies) With These Top-Rated Coffee Machines appeared first on PEDESTRIAN.TV .

author: PK Hattis
title: Santa Cruz County RTC Executive Director Guy Preston to retire at end of year
description: "After a very dynamic and fulfilling 34 years in transportation planning, programming, engineering and project delivery, I have decided on Dec. 1 I will pack up my empty coffee thermos, jump on my bike and ride home from (the) RTC office for the last time," said Executive Director Guy Preston.

author: Donnell Suggs
title: This new smoothie and juice shop plans to meet a need in Gainesville. Here’s when and where
description: An emerging Gainesville business owner’s dream of running a coffee shop has morphed into a means of offering healthy alternatives to fast and fried foods.

author: Andrew Crighton
title: Not for profit Igloo Coffee Shop opens in Hastings
description: The Igloo Coffee Shop, operated by the Snowflake Trust Ltd, is a not-for-profit venture, and was officially opened 29th July 2023 by Hastings and Rye MP, Sally-Ann Hart and Philip Day, a former guest at the Winter Night Shelter.

author: Standard Business
title: Wamuchomba urges state to set up anti-coffee theft police unit
description: Githunguri MP Gathoni Wamucomba has appealed to the government to set up anti-coffee theft police unit to save farmers from losing the crop to criminals in Mt Kenya region.

author: Abby Connolly
title: While Always Treating Yourself Is Great For Improving Your Quality of Life, It Can Drain Your Bank Account Faster Than You Realize
description: Who doesn’t love treating themselves?  Over the last few years, everyone’s been talking about the beauty of the “little treat.” The $6 coffee you get from Starbucks after you’ve completed a difficult task? That’s a little treat. The new candle or skincare product you bought from Target on your way home from work the other […]

author: Conor Murray, Forbes Staff
title: Costa Coffee Latest Victim Of Anti-‘Woke’ Anger Over Design Featuring Trans Person
description: The British coffee chain included an illustration of a trans person who has top surgery scars on a company van.

author: Wiktoria Wrzyszcz
title: Couple running much loved Chesterfield coffee van reassure customers they will be back - following road accident
description: A much loved Chesterfield coffee van was involved in traffic accident last week – but owners are reassuring customers they will be back as soon as possible.
